basis_errors.duplicate_cross_loc: INSERT INTO v2_cross_section_location (id, code, reference_level, friction_type, friction_value, bank_level, the_geom, channel_id, definition_id) SELECT 99999, code, reference_level, friction_type, friction_value, bank_level, the_geom, channel_id, definition_id FROM v2_cross_section_location WHERE id = 282;
basis_errors.cross_loc_not_on_vertex: UPDATE v2_cross_section_location SET the_geom = ST_project(the_geom, 1, radians(0)) where id = 320;
